name: Super Jetpack (Oculus Quest)
description:
SUPER JETPACK - Zombie Survival A VR experience for Oculus Quest.

===========================

Your city was infested by a zombie virus, you are the last one. You have a jetpack and weapons, how much can you survive?

===========================

To play this game you have to enable developer mode on your Oculus Quest and install it with the Sidequest app

===========================

Please consider leaving an honest review, your feedback will influence the future of this project. We hope you like it!
